article.headline: Georgetown 69, Towson 41
article.story: WASHINGTON (AP) -- DaJuan Summers scored 18 points and led Georgetown on a 3-point shooting spree in a 69-41 victory over Towson on Wednesday night. Jonathan Wallace added 14 and Jeff Green had 12 for the Hoyas (8-3), who connected on 12 3-pointers to win their fourth straight. The Tigers (5-5) were led by Gary Neal's 26 points. The Hoyas led 22-20 with less than four minutes to play in the first half when Summers hit the first of his four 3-pointers to start a 12-6 Hoyas run to close the half. Neal scored the Tigers' final 13 points of the half and his fourth 3-pointer with seconds remaining cut Georgetown's lead to 34-26. The Hoyas' run continued in the second half. They extended the lead to double figures for good when Summers and Patrick Ewing Jr. hit back-to-back 3's to make it 44-29 with 15:22 remaining. Towson never got closer than 13 points the rest of the way. The Hoyas finished 12-for-21 from beyond the arc and shot 59 percent overall. Summers went 7-for-9 from the floor, including 4-for-6 from 3-point range. Wallace went 4-for-4 in the first half, all 3-pointers. Neal finished with seven 3-pointers but was 0-for-6 from inside the arc. No other player scored more than six points for the Tigers, who shot 26 percent for the game. ^

statistics.name: points
statistics.description: The number of points scored.

statistics.name: fieldGoals
statistics.description: Field Goal makes and attempts.

statistics.name: freeThrows
statistics.description: Free Throw makes and attempts.

statistics.name: assists
statistics.description: The number of times a player who passes the ball to a teammate in a way that leads to a score by field goal, meaning that he or she was "assisting" in the basket. There is some judgment involved in deciding whether a passer should be credited with an assist.

statistics.name: turnovers
statistics.description: The number of times a player loses possession to the other team.

statistics.name: minutes
statistics.description: The total number of minutes played.

statistics.name: assistTurnoverRatio
statistics.description: The average number of assists a player or team records per turnover
